He is a Aisan- Mexican. He has the perfect tan and has great muscles. He has luxorious flowing black hair and has eyes to kill for. Jake has huge hands if you know what I am saying. You made plans to hangout and catch up with one of these guys on your vacation at home.
153.title: Theater Friends

154.content: You may not have been the most poplular kid in highschool, but you had a couple of aquaintances that you were friends with as kids that still talked to you. You being a theater techie wedged a social gap between you, but this will be the perfect time to kick back and hang with the 'cool' kids. Nick was one of your bestfriends in elementary school. He is 6'0 and has long sweeping blond hair. Nick plays basketball giving you a perfect view of his sweaty pits during games. Nick has size 12 feet. Then there is Dylan. Dylan and you were almost inseperable in elementary school, but he moved to Bakersfield and you hadn't talked in years. He went to college down here and you could call and catch up with him. Dylan got a full ride scholarship for base ball. Dylan has short spikey black hair and baby soft skin. He has blue eyes that melt your heart. Then there is Chris. You met him in highschool and he always cheated off of your tests because you had so many classes together. He isn't really your friend, but he loved taking advantage of you in hig school. Maybe he has grown up and you can be friends? Chris has light brown hair that he flicks to the side. Chris plays football and is a wide receiver. He is thin, but very well toned. His best feature is his dopey smile. Which athletic hunk will you hangout with today?
154.title: Sports Friends

info.brief_description: Your brother moved out with you and two friends. One day you shrink.
info.description: You move out with your brother and his two friends. One day you shrink. You choose to explore there hot 'bods' or hide from the horny men.
